name: Anti Zombie Gunner Team
description:
Anti-Zombie Gunner Team

Hello Friends,Zombies have been attacked on the city and you have to save your city from the Dead Beats attack, download this game and save a city from the attack of Dead Heads.
The city is in danger: a deadly virus is infecting a growing number of new territories, turning people into Biters.
Save your city from the Roamers and become a super hero of the city,take your favorite weapons and kill the zombies by using that weapons.
A large number of people are infected with viruses T and become Dead Heads. You are one of the survivors. You are involved in the war against the Dead Beats.
Anti-Zombie Gunner Team is a simple and addicting game with HQ graphics.
Attack & Kill different the zombies to save the civilians!
The only way left for you is to target these Noob otherwise this will be the day of dead for you.
Your mission is not only to survive but also to shoot down the Roamers with modern weapons and Guns.
Shooting simulation and gun customization are also provided.

List of the most popular download zombie shooting games. And newly released games chosen by the author.

FEATURES:
-Enjoy shocking music and sound effect!
-Experience the sensation of firing wildly!
-Kill different kinds of zombies!
-New weapons and upgrade system!
-Enjoy the sensation of firing and killing the evil.
- Cool high fidelity 3D graphics.
- Immersive game play.
